title:
The path is soft to your feet,
The wind blows light on your shoulders.
May the sun shine warm upon your...

attachments.displayName:
The path is soft to your feet,
The wind blows light on your shoulders.
May the sun shine warm upon your face,
The rains fall serene in your fields.

That the open road ahead of you,
the wind blows gently on your back,
may the sun shine warm and gentle on your face,
the rain fall softly on your fields.

That the raindrops gently wet your face,
the gentle wind refresh your spirit,
the sun illuminate your heart
that the tasks of the day are not a burden on your shoulders,
and the purity you wrap a cloak of love.

object.content:
The path is soft to your feet,
The wind blows light on your shoulders.
May the sun shine warm upon your face,
The rains fall serene in your fields.

That the open road ahead of you,
the wind blows gently on your back,
may the sun shine warm and gentle on your face,
the rain fall softly on your fields.

That the raindrops gently wet your face,
the gentle wind refresh your spirit,
the sun illuminate your heart
that the tasks of the day are not a burden on your shoulders,
and the purity you wrap a cloak of love.
